Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/13217.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]

Item.Name: Silver Screen Spirits Pool Bar
Item.Content:
Silver Screen Spirits Pool Bar in Disney's All-Star Movies Resort, Disney's All-Star Movies Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Silver Screen Spirits Pool Bar

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002134.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Discuss your favorite flicks over drinks at the bar or head to the Fantasia Pool with a cup to go. Turn a refreshing matinee into a tantalizing double feature by choosing from featured draft beers, specialty cocktails, sangria and wine.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: World Premiere Food Court
Item.Content:
World Premiere Food Court in Disney's All-Star Movies Resort, Disney's All-Star Movies Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for World Premiere Food Court

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002408.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Get the red-carpet treatment at this cinema-themed food court with 5 stations: pizza and pasta, grill items, traditional favorites, specialties, and bakery items and ice cream, served until midnight. Breakfast is available until 11:00 AM.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted
